attributes.action: Free no-whip Confidence Vote on Austerity Osborne's ideologically driven Economic Contraction Cuts
attributes.additional_details: Austerity Osborne's ideologically driven Economic Contraction Cuts are proven to be hampering recovery and are clearly causing long-term harm to the UK economy therefore both need to be terminated immediately before any further economic damage is inflicted on 99% of the UK population prior to the 2015 general election.
